Docs.summary: Provides access to the current values of object data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Data.Objects.CurrentValueRecord> object contains a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord> view of the object or relationship tracked by an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry>.
<xref:System.Data.Objects.CurrentValueRecord> implements <xref:System.Data.IExtendedDataRecord>, which provides read-only access to the current values of entities, relationships, and metadata.
Implements methods that allow updates to the current values.
